name: fast-eslint-8
description: ESLint v8.x linter plugin for JavaScript, based on fast-eslint
author: Copied from Arnaud Dezandee <dezandee.arnaud@gmail.com> (https://github.com/arnaud-dezandee)

baseConfigExtends.title: BaseConfig Extends
baseConfigExtends.description: List of ESLint shareable config names. See [shareable configs](http://eslint.org/docs/developer-guide/shareable-configs). Those will be used as *baseConfig.extends*. Example: **standard, standard-react**

useEslintrc.title: Use .eslintrc.* files
useEslintrc.description: Automatically load and use configuration files, that can be found in default locations.

overrideConfigFile.title: .eslintrc.* override file.
overrideConfigFile.description: One configuration file, to rule them all (overrides all other files).

rulePaths.title: Configuration directories.
rulePaths.description: An array of additional directories, to load custom rules from.

grammarScopes.title: Grammar scopes
grammarScopes.description: Run `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine file scopes.
